spec_data.Name: ghc-hledger-lib
spec_data.Description:
This is a reusable library containing hledger's core functionality.

hledger is a cross-platform program for tracking money, time, or any other
commodity, using double-entry accounting and a simple, editable file format.
It is inspired by and largely compatible with ledger(1). hledger provides
command-line, curses and web interfaces, and aims to be a reliable, practical
tool for daily use.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 03:01:43 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Core data types, parsers and functionality for the hledger accounting tools
